name: Haunted Shores
description:
Haunted Shores is a Single-player horror game where you assume the role of Alicia Prescott, an investigative journalist of the paranormal, travelling to different locations confirming or debunking the tales of each. Just you against myth, and the desire to stay alive.

The game is played in the first person perspective. Once on location, it is up to the player to search the areas, collect clues, and make their way through each by using the clues they find, and information that is present in the level along with some logic, while avoiding potential dangers that may lurk in the darkness.




Key Features
• Investigate and survive the dangers of each location while gathering evidence confirming or debunking the stories that surround each

• Each level is carefully crafted with quality and function at the forefront.

• Haunted Shores is based on the tales that have terrified people for decades. There is something within for every horror fan to enjoy.
